content: Hey @matklad @std::Veetaha, I was looking around for libraries that can edit Cargo.toml and found https://github.com/matklad/tom. I have tried toml_edit but it is doing a lot of changing. What I would need is an editor that would preserve everything else except the parts we edit. Is that the direction that repo will go in?
Oof. I would say that we already solved this for rust-analyzer, right? So, can I just copy patterns and api from RA to it and then release the editor/visitor?
I am not interested in LSP for now. Only the editor but it would be semantic
@matklad Can I go ahead?
(although I musth confess I am not sure I understand the question -- the code is MIT/Apache licensed, so you can do that without asking anybody)
